    • getDiffScore

      public double getDiffScore​(int graft_node, int prune_node)
      Parsimony score change for a subtree-prune-and-regraft operation.
      Parameters:
      graft_node - graft node (new sibling for prune node), original parent becomes grandparet
      prune_node - pruned node, detached from original parent, and joins graft node under a new common parent node
      Returns:
